Browse the source code of netbsd/crypto/external/bsd/openssl/dist/crypto/uid.c

9
10#include <openssl/crypto.h>
11#include <openssl/opensslconf.h>
12
13#if defined(__OpenBSD__) || (defined(__FreeBSD__) && __FreeBSD__ > 2) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
14
15# include <unistd.h>
16
17int OPENSSL_issetugid(void)
18{
19 return issetugid();
20}
21
22#elif defined(OPENSSL_SYS_WIN32) || defined(OPENSSL_SYS_VXWORKS) || defined(OPENSSL_SYS_UEFI)
23
24int OPENSSL_issetugid(void)
25{
26 return 0;
27}
28
29#else
30
31# include OPENSSL_UNISTD
32# include <sys/types.h>
33
34# if defined(__GLIBC__) && defined(__GLIBC_PREREQ)
35# if __GLIBC_PREREQ(2, 16)
36# include <sys/auxv.h>
37# define OSSL_IMPLEMENT_GETAUXVAL
38# endif
39# endif
40
41int OPENSSL_issetugid(void)
42{
43# ifdef OSSL_IMPLEMENT_GETAUXVAL
44 return getauxval(AT_SECURE) != 0;
45# else
46 return getuid() != geteuid() || getgid() != getegid();
47# endif
48}
49#endif
50
